definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
to speak in a pleasant and captivating manner (idiom)

sentences.english: Who speaks words that are lovelier than those of Jesus?
sentences.chinese: 有誰說的話比耶穌更動聽？

sentences.english: A beautiful ballad written by Hins Cheung.
sentences.chinese: 這是張敬軒寫的一首很優美動聽的歌曲。

sentences.english: He who gives fair words feed you with an empty spoon.
sentences.chinese: 說話動聽的人只提供空言。

sentences.english: The pleasant music made from the instruments enticed the phoenix and pheasants to dance.
sentences.chinese: 吹打起來，十分動聽，鳳鳥錦雉隨着樂聲跳起舞來。

sentences.english: He had a beautiful deep voice, and played an instrument called a banjo.
sentences.chinese: 他有着一副低沉動聽的嗓音，還會彈奏班卓琴。

sentences.english: In the rain, a 11)blackbird was singing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 在雨中，一隻烏鶇正在鳴唱，歌聲優美動聽。

sentences.english: So she directed my daughter how to play the flute fair-sounding.
sentences.chinese: 於是，她就指導我女兒如何才能把長笛吹得動聽一些。

sentences.english: All sorts of fine-sounding schemes were brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 各種各樣動聽的計劃給提了出來。

sentences.english: He can sweeten the ordinary things.
sentences.chinese: 他能把極平常之事說得十分動聽。

sentences.english: Soon the room is filled with Bates' mellifluous tones.
sentences.chinese: 很快，房間裏便充滿了貝茨動聽的聲音。

sentences.english: He can make ordinary things sound interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他能把極平常的事兒說得很動聽。

sentences.english: I'm fond of seeing musicals. The dancing is very beautiful and the music is pretty.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看歌舞片，舞蹈十分美妙，而音樂又美麗動聽。

sentences.english: The boy has a clear voice – when he sings it's beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 這男孩子嗓音清脆，唱起歌來悅耳動聽。

sentences.english: The children will sing English songs and chants.
sentences.chinese: 我們還要爲大家唱最動聽的英語歌謠。

sentences.english: What has been your charge for repeating this very plausible story?
sentences.chinese: 你複述這個娓娓動聽的故事，得到了多少酬勞？

definition: singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
